page.title: 09SACKVILLE SCHOOL
page.content: The school was founded in 1859 and moved to its present position on the Lewes Road in 1964.The first compre- hensive intake was in 1970.The school is a mixed 11-19,8/9 form entry with 1520 on roll.There is a Lower School (years 1-2),Middle School (years 3-5) and an Upper School.Both 1st and 2nd deputies are responsible for curriculum devel. ,exams,time-tabling, staff deploy,ent etc. Children follow a common curriculum for 3 years and setting is introduced later.Pupils are taught the standard subjects and can do ceramics,computing,typing etc. About 20 subjects are offered at A-level and in 1984 the school intro- duced a CPVE course for 6th formers.
